intro: Stephanophysum, commonly known as the Christmas star, is a flowering plant native to South America. It belongs to the family Acanthaceae and is characterized by its striking, star-shaped flowers. The plant features opposite, lance-shaped leaves that are often covered in fine hairs. Its blooming period typically occurs during the warmer months, producing clusters of vibrant, colorful flowers. Stephanophysum is often cultivated for its ornamental value in gardens and as a houseplant.
